seriesJson.title: The music of Don Gillis III
seriesJson.description: This series spotlights the works of American composer Don Gillis and is hosted by the man himself.

node.title: Program 26
node.description: This program focuses on the composer's favorites.

node.title: Program 25
node.description: This program features "Ballet for Band" and "Saga of a Pioneer."

node.description: This program features "The Mighty Mac" and "Arturo Toscanini: A Portrait of a Century."

node.description: This program features "Hymn Song for Sunday;" "Twinkletoes;" "Three Sketches for Strings;" and "The Man Who Invented Music."
